name: ZPD CHONDROITIN SULFATE
description: ZPD Chondroitin Sulfate is a natural substance that can help protect your joint cartilage. Chondroitin Sulfate is widely used in the treatment of osteoarthritis, which may be a result of wear and tear due to sport or natural aging process. It may also relief pains related to joint health problems. Chondroitin Sulfate helps keeping cartilage healthy by absorbing liquid (especially water) in the connective tissue. It can also block the enzymes that degrade cartilage, and it provides the building blocks for the body to produce new cartilage.
